mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pitch_times(sub_pitch_id, time_slot_id, price, is_active) VALUES (#{subPitchId}, #{timeSlotId}, #{price}, #{isActive})
mapper.select: SELECT pt.price, pt.is_active AS isActive, ts.start_time AS startTime, ts.end_time AS endTime, pt.time_slot_id AS timeSlotId FROM pitch_times pt LEFT JOIN time_slots ts ON ts.id = pt.time_slot_id WHERE pt.sub_pitch_id = #{subPitchId}
